entries.text: You are not connected to the network.
Frame rate is not appropriate for multiplayer.

Failed to save game due to corrupted save data.
Try again?
Select YES to attempt another save, or NO to return to title screen without saving game.
Failed to save game due to corrupted save data.
Cannot join Versus Room without closing dialog.
Cannot join Versus Room until you confirm or abandon edits.
Characters that cannot be used have been replaced with an asterisk (*).

Join Versus Room?
(Your current progress will be lost.)
HDR setting has been changed to OFF.
HDR setting has been changed to ON.

At the end of the previous session, Return to Title Screen or Quit Game might not have been selected from the SYSTEM menu.
Failure to end session using either of these options may result in loss of progress.
Failed to create save data. Select OK to try again.
Failed to load save data. Select OK to try again.

Failed to save game due to corrupted save data.
Select OK to try again.

The save data is corrupted.
Delete save data and create new save data?

Save data does not match game version.
Quit the game, apply the update file in the Steam client, then restart the game.

Save data cannot be loaded due to the game version being outdated.
Quit the game, apply the update file in the Steam client, then restart the game.

Starting in offline mode.
If you wish to use network features, please check your connection, then select LOG IN from the title screen.
Unable to connect to the network. Please check your network settings.
Failed to check network connection status.

Frame rate problem detected. Cannot start multiplayer.
Please resolve the problem and then restart the game.
No game progress data found. Unable to join Versus Room.
Your account is presently blocked from using <?gameServer?>.
Failed to log in to <?gameServer?>. Select OK to attempt another login.

An update file is available.
To start in online mode, quit the game, apply the update file, then restart the game.
Cannot log in to <?gameServer?> due to maintenance or closure of server.
Failed to acquire latest information. Select OK to try again.

Found existing game progress data.
Delete this data and start a new game?
Failed to load save data due to its being corrupted.
An error occurred. Returning to title screen.
An error has occurred. Cannot start multiplayer session.
Cannot start multiplayer session in offline mode.

Online Battle Simulator: Nest must be unlocked to begin multiplayer session.
Progress through the game to gain access.
Cannot join Versus Room during an imperative mission. Please complete the mission and try again.
Inappropriate activity detected. Online mode cannot be used.
Failed to connect to Epic Online Services (<?errcodeEOS?>). Online mode cannot be accessed.
Failed to connect to Steamworks (<?errcodeSteam?>). Online mode cannot be accessed.
Failed to connect to Epic Online Services (<?errcodeEOS?>).

Resolution changed. Keep this setting?
(Resolution will revert to the previous setting in <?remainingSec?> seconds without any further input.)
